name: Dungeons and Dating (CalArts GameMakers)
description:
Dungeons and Dating is a game about overcoming emotional obstacles. You and your romantic interest must fight the manifestations of your dating fears in order to have a successful date.

CREDITS:

Travis Nishii - Moderator

S. Hopping

Fernanda Haiabe 

Noah Dean

Socks Whitmore

Vania Xiang

Claire Redman

Evan Sutterfield

Samuel Wilby

Kyle Cooke-Gilbert

PRODUCERS:

Vincent De La Torre, Marley Townsend, Roy Berardo, Theo Vaillant

You can listen to the soundtrack from this game and other CalArts Game Makers titles here!
